channel.title: but seriously on Khaled Allen
channel.description: Recent content in but seriously on Khaled Allen

item.title: How Annoying Your Sister can Help You Achieve Your Dreams
item.description: My new theory on success is based on techniques I developed annoying my sister, applied to the universe (thanks, L). Here is how it works: I say something I want to be right about: Mommy likes me better. She says the opposite, or simply refutes my argument: Nuh uh! I persist: Uh huh! We repeat the process until one of us tires and the other person's perception is accepted as fact.
